ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:00:21 [Issue ID 4000-221077] urn:comicvine:4000-221077 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:28:51. [Issue ID 381777]
ComicInfo.Summary: Jim and Pinocchio continue their quest to Oz, when they are sidetracked by a band of religious zealots who kidnap Pinocchio! At the same time, Red and Piper confront Grandma's kidnapper, who points the finger at Alice! An exciting, action-packed issue not to be missed!
ComicInfo.Title: Wisdom Seeker, Part 2 of 4
